amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Energy to ensure that the costs of general and administrative overhead are not allocated to laboratory directed research and development.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3317 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3317 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Heinrich to Amendment SA 2953. (consideration: CR S2145-2191; text: CR S2150) To require the Secretary of Energy to ensure that the costs of general and administrative overhead are not allocated to laboratory directed research and development.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3317 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3317 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Heinrich to Amendment SA 2953.
